review: I bought this product as I was heading overseas so I could keep up with the movies and tv shows I would be missing.  I soon found out that this would not work outside the United States. They have since corrected this with so I can now access all the media and  now they have added the music so it it is like having a theatre, gaming sytem and stereo all in one. My only disappointment is that it has a usb port that has no function. I was hoping I could connect my hard drive to view and play my media. Hopefully this will be active in a future upgrade.

review: I mostly use the Fire now to watch Netflix as all the shows that Amazon offers are expensive. They cost more than watching them on Comcast. Comcast has a feature where I can list free movies. I have not found a way through voice command or menu option to find free movies easily. Also I have connected a CAT-6 cable as movies freeze/pause with the wireless option.
